steps: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add tomato and cook until mushy.
Add carrot, cauliflower, and potato with salt and turmeric.
Cook covered until veggies are tender.
Cut potato and cauliflower into medium chunks.
Fry onions, garlic, and ginger until brown.
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until soft.
Add potato and cauliflower, cook covered until done.
Chop carrots, tomatoes, and onions.
Sauté garlic and onion, then add carrots and tomatoes.
Add water, cook until soft, blend until smooth.
Season and serve hot.
Chop all veggies into similar-sized pieces.
Stir fry onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add veggies and salt, cook on high flame till slightly crispy.
Prepare ginger-garlic paste, sauté until fragrant.
Add onion and tomato, cook until soft.
Add veggies and cook until tender, serve hot.
Chop veggies finely.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger, add tomato.
Add veggies, stir fry with cooked rice, serve hot.
Boil and mash potato and carrot.
Add sautéed onion, garlic, ginger, and salt.
Form patties, coat with bread crumbs, shallow fry until golden.
Grate carrot, mash potato, and chop onion.
Mix with spices, stuff into dough, roll, and cook on tawa until golden.
Make a thick tomato-onion gravy with garlic and ginger.
Add veggies, cook till tender, serve with rice or roti.
Blanch cauliflower and potato.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger, add tomato.
Add veggies and cook in masala until done.
Parboil veggies, sauté onions and garlic.
Add veggies, chili powder, and salt, stir-fry till crispy.
Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, and tomatoes.
Add water, boil, season with salt and pepper, serve hot.
Chop cauliflower into florets, boil lightly.
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, add florets and cook till crispy.
Grate carrot, slice onion, mix with gram flour, salt, and garlic paste.
Deep fry spoonfuls till golden, serve hot.
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, add chopped veggies.
Add rice, water, and cook till fluffy.
Boil noodles, sauté veggies with garlic and ginger.
Toss noodles with sautéed veggies, serve hot.
Make tomato-onion masala, add cauliflower, cook till soft, serve.
Slice potatoes, sauté with garlic, onion, and chili powder until crispy.
Make onion-tomato base, add boiled veggies, simmer for 10 minutes.
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and tomato in handi.
Add all veggies, slow cook with lid on, serve hot.
Cook rice separately, prepare garlic-ginger masala.
Mix rice with veggies and serve hot.
Grate carrot and cauliflower, mix with onion, garlic, and spices.
Stuff into dough, roll and cook paratha.
Peel and chop potatoes into cubes, slice onions, and finely chop garlic and ginger.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger until golden, then add onions and cook until soft.
Add turmeric powder, salt, and potatoes; mix well, cover, and cook on low flame until potatoes are soft, stirring occasionally.
Remove the lid, cook on medium flame, stirring until potatoes are golden and crispy, then serve hot.
Sauté spices with onion, garlic, ginger, and tomato.
Mix cooked rice and cauliflower, cook for 5 mins.
Peel and chop carrots, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger into small pieces.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for a minute, then add carrots and tomatoes, cook until they turn soft.
Add salt and let the mixture cool slightly, then transfer everything to a blender and grind into a smooth chutney.
Serve fresh with dosa, idli, or rice; optional tempering with mustard seeds and curry leaves can be added for extra flavor.
Prepare masala base
Add chopped veggies
cook until soft, serve hot.
Cook onion, garlic, ginger, and tomato till mushy
Add cauliflower
cook till done.
Julienne carrot and ginger
mix with garlic, mustard, salt, and oil
keep for 1 day before serving.
Peel and chop carrot and potato into small cubes, cut cauliflower into florets, and finely chop onion, tomato, garlic, and ginger.
Boil the chopped carrot, potato, and cauliflower in salted water until 70% cooked, then drain and set aside.
Heat oil on a flat tawa or wide pan, add garlic, ginger, and onion, sauté until onions are golden brown, then add tomatoes and cook until soft and mushy forming a gravy base.
Add the boiled vegetables, sprinkle salt, and cook on medium flame, stirring occasionally until vegetables are nicely roasted and slightly crispy; serve hot with roti or paratha.
